widgets.title: I am...
widgets.description: a Full Stack Developer and a graduate from Sheridan College Mobile Computing program. I have an interest in cloud computing, distributed actor model systems, programming languages that protect you from yourself (rust ðŸ¦€) and full stack development. My experience includes working at RBC on their platform teams where I've learned about Kubernetes, Terraform, and Azure. I've also worked for a startup called Ownr that helped to automate creating small business in canada! While in school, I had an interest in machine learning and did some research into fall detection through The Centre for Mobile Innovation at Sheridan College. Technology excites me a lot and I like to spend my free time on it, right now that trying to create my own serverless platform using web assembly.

widgets.title: I also...
widgets.description: Cycle, ice skate, snowboard and white water canoe. I'm a cat lover but dogs are also cool I guess. While in school I was the vice president of the Hackademics club at Sheridan college and we hosted a hackathon.
